title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' is shown.
EB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the JAR should be created successfully without any error messages.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file and make some edits without saving. 2. Open the JAR packager for the project associated with the file. 3. Provide all the required information such as path, destination, and name in the JAR packager. 4. Press the 'Finish' button and observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
